meanings.definition: The act of straightening or relaxing something that is bent.
meanings.sent1: Her gentle unbendings of the paperclip made it straight again.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the unbendings of his body during yoga class.
meanings.sent3: The unbendings of the stubborn door finally allowed it to open.
meanings.sent4: His unbendings of the rules showed his flexibility in decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The unbendings of the tree branches after the storm were a relief to see.

meanings.definition: The quality of being firm or resolute in attitude or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Her unbendings in negotiations made her a tough opponent.
meanings.sent2: His unbendings in his beliefs showed his strong character.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unbendings in demanding treats were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her unbendings in the face of adversity were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The unbendings of the mountain against the wind were impressive to witness.
